definition: side door
one side/other/different/lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
surname Men
dissenting religious sect (idiom); heretical school of opinion/dissident group

sentences.english: Say, several big fellow BangMen went there.
sentences.chinese: 說罷，幾個大漢往旁門那邊去了。

sentences.english: Can you tell me where it is available?
sentences.chinese: 這種工法怎麼能說是旁門左道呢？

sentences.english: Such Confucianism achievement is what you side heresy in the door can compare?
sentences.chinese: 如此儒家功，豈是你們旁門左道所能比擬的？

sentences.english: Take the company of heterodoxy, final meeting becomes his victim.
sentences.chinese: 走旁門左道的企業，最終會成爲自己的受害者。

sentences.english: However, his prose was used in order to propel propaganda of a notorious kind.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他的散文卻被用來宣傳旁門妖道。

sentences.english: The butler who opened the door damned near passed out.
sentences.chinese: 管家開了門，責怪他不走旁門。

sentences.english: Suddenly, from BangMen into several big fellow background .
sentences.chinese: 突然，從旁門闖進後臺幾個大漢。
